item.description:
NOTE:  Start time changed to 9:00 as of 10/28 Meetup. I'll continue to bump the time forward in November -- November?  Yep. -- as appropriate (and send a notice to those who've RSVPd -- heh, subtle! ;-) as long as there's interest and playable weather.

Given the shifting time, the deadline for cancellation & the cancellation notice to those who've RSVPd -- the delicacy of a jackhammer! -- will always be one half hour before the start time.

----------------------------

All levels welcome!

If you can't show up at the early start time of 9:00, no problem; just arrive when you can.

If there's obvious bad weather, I'll send a cancellation notice by 8:30 Sat. morning.

Dugger Park has five public courts and is not far from the Tufts courts.

If attending, please RSVP so I'll have a rough idea of how many courts we'll need.

If you don't know your "level," no problem.

If you do have an idea of your level though, please list it when you RSVP as it'll help me group players of similar levels on courts.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for guy w/ glasses and right knee pad
item.name: Tennis Saturday AM at Dugger Park, Medford
